snippet.title: 「D4DJ Groovy Mix」Promotional Video
snippet.description:
Check out the promotional video for「D4DJ Groovy Mix」, coming May 27th!

「About D4DJ Groovy Mix」
A Rhythm X Adventure Game set in the world of D4DJ!
Enjoy fully-voiced stories and interact with 6 unique DJ units!
Play tons of original and cover songs♪

ー ✕ ー

#D4DJ! Presenting a new and different media mix project where we mix together DJ LIVE × ANIME × GAME!

Official Website: https://en.d4dj-pj.com
Project Twitter: https://twitter.com/D4DJ_pj_EN
Game Twitter: http://twitter.com/d4dj_game_en
Project Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/D4DJProjectEN
Game Facebook: http://facebook.com/D4DJGroovyMix
Project Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/d4dj_global
Game Instagram: http://instagram.com/d4dj_game_en

♪ Rhythm App Game「D4DJ Groovy Mix」Coming May 27th!
♪ Anime「D4DJ First Mix」and「D4DJ Petit Mix」Now on YouTube!

Subscribe to our channel for more "D4DJ" contents! ♪
Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram for upcoming news!

Stay Tuned ♪ ~

#D4DJ #GroovyMix
